text: Ka'uke'o yadi tara manda kajake tara kache cittakarsaka kara haya ebam se'o eti bhala bale dekhe se ki tabe? Sutaram allah abasya bipathe calate dena yake tini iccha karena, ara satpathe paricalita karena yake tini iccha karena. Ata'eba tumi tadera jan'ya aksepera dbara tomara nijeke binasa hate diyo na. Nihsandeha tara ya kare se sanbandhe allah sarbajnata.
